items.title: Senior Web Engineer at Maark (Boston, MA)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=1, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=8, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=9}
items.content:
Senior Web Engineer

About this job

Job type: Contract
Company: Maark | Boston, MA

Remote details

Office Location: Boston, MA. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

ux
ui
javascript
react

Job description

At MAARK, we are passionate about bringing innovation and advanced concepts to life and sweating every detail in order to create the best possible experience for our clients and their customers. We believe that every interaction and transaction a user has with a product should be designed and built to work for that individual.

The clients we work with span a host of verticals – ranging from large financial institutions to telecoms to hospitality to bio-engineering. And the problems we solve for them range from highly animated, interactive frontends, to complex business rules on the backend, to IoT solutions that bridge digital and real worlds. We love diving into new subjects and researching our clients' businesses and look to work with people who are just as naturally curious.

In this role, you will work as part of our growing development team to craft and build frontend side of apps and web sites. We work on highly creative projects, utilize a wide variety of fullstack technologies, and empower each of our developers to create innovative solutions and explore and master emerging web technologies.

The ideal candidate would be Boston-based, but for this contractor role, we would be open to remote candidates as well.


Benefits


About Maark

Maark is a strategic marketing and innovation agency for global companies - headquartered in Boston, MA. We help our clients define and articulate their vision, design new connected customer experiences, and develop applications at the intersection of where what’s possible meets what’s relevant.

We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. We strongly believe that diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will lead to a better environment for our employees and a better experience for our clients.

Maark is an Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) employer. It is the policy of Maark to prohibit discrimination and harassment of any type and to afford equal employment opportunities to all persons without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, gender, physical or mental disability, veteran-status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state or local law.

Apply now

About Maark

Maark is a strategic marketing and innovation agency for global companies - headquartered in Cambridge, MA. We help our clients define and articulate their vision, design new connected customer experiences, and develop applications at the intersection of where what’s possible meets what’s relevant.

items.title: Cvedia PTE. LTD.: Remote Senior Unity3D Developer for Cvedia.com - American Time Zone
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=8, c=0, mobile=15, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=4, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=24, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Remote Senior Unity3D Developer for Cvedia.com - American Time Zone

Company: Cvedia PTE. LTD.
Headquarters: Europe
www.cvedia.com
Cvedia is Simulating the world.  We are generating hyper realistic simulator built for autonomous applications and machine learning.

Requirements:

- 5 years experience with Unity3D

- Desktop performance optimization (specially rendering optimization)

We offer:

- Young Funded Start -Up company with Clients and endless opportunities In the most interesting and practical Industry of the Future.

How should you apply for this job?

  • Please state on the mail subject the job position you are applying for.

  • Please mention your country of origin in the email. Unfortunately, we only hire US time zone  employees to avoid time zone differences.

Please send your applications to jobs at Cvedia dot com

About us: Unleash the limitations of the physical world with a state-of-the-art simulation platform. Cvedia constructs synthetic 3D real or fictitious environments and provides sensor simulations robust enough to train, validate, and verify artificial intelligence algorithms for land, aerial, and marine autonomous applications. https://cvedia.com https://syncity.com


Apply for this position

please send your resume to jobs@cvedia.com

CTO/Tech Lead at Faaya Lifestyle

India, Remote, New York City, Remote · Cofounder

We are changing the way people are dressing up and feeling about themselves in a more affordable and accessible way. We have a flat hierarchy and the only time we will force you is when we think you ain't having enough fun. We believe in the ability of each individual to be able to change an entire team.
Our Motto " It ain't gonna be fun using it, if it's not gonna be fun building it. "

Applied
Apply to Faaya Lifestyle
Add a message to Faaya Lifestyle

What We're Building

Faaya helps users create their own unique designs or customize an exisiting one to their preference upto the smallest possible detail. The design is then manufactured to their size and delivered to their doorstep, made to their preferences of color, fabric and style.

We are changing how companies create fashion and how consumers consume fashion.

On the platform, you have the option to either send us your designs to be contacted back by your own personal designer for free, or play around with any of the available templates.

The measurement happens both online and offline, using technology as well as human interface.

Your quest for fashion that fits has just begun. Dress Well. Be Awesome.

Hiring in India, Remote, New York City, Remote OK
11-50 Employees
$300K Seed in 2015
E-Commerce, Retail, Fashion, Fashion Tech
